from sys import stdin, stdout
from math import ceil
t = int(stdin.readline())
while t:
	t -= 1
	a, b, c, k = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split(' '))
	if b*b - 4*a*(c-k) <= 0:
		stdout.write(str(max((int(ceil((-1.0*b)/(2.0*a)))), 0)) + "\n")
	else:
		d = pow((b*b - 4*a*(c-k)), 0.5)
		roots = [(-1.0*b + d) / (2.0*a), (-1.0*b - d)/(2.0*a)]
		roots = map(ceil, roots)
		roots[:] = [i for i in roots if i >= 0]
		if len(roots):
			stdout.write(str(int(min(roots)))+"\n")
		else:
			stdout.write("0\n")
